# Message Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Filled

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Success | `app-message alert-success` |
| Info | `app-message alert-info` |
| Warning | `app-message alert-warning` |
| Danger | `app-message alert-danger` |
| Loading | `app-message alert-loading` |
